coreAttributes.name: Ea
coreAttributes.description: Ea is a joust-like sword that is made up of 3 rotating barrels that concentrate air to an unimaginable level of destructive power. This weapon belonging to the king of heroes, is said to be the most precious weapon in the endless treasury of the gate of babylon.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] Ea at [npc.her] hip, so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] Ea at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Ea, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Ea, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Ea, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Ea, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
